thread.title: Trump steel tariffs threaten American steel jobs

title: Trump steel tariffs threaten American steel jobs
text:
Trump steel tariffs threaten American steel jobs 1:35am IST - 02:22 
President Trump's new steel and aluminum tariffs are aimed at protecting U.S. jobs but some workers at a Pennsylvania steel plant could be sent to the unemployment line as a result. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
President Trump's new steel and aluminum tariffs are aimed at protecting U.S. jobs but some workers at a Pennsylvania steel plant could be sent to the unemployment line as a result.
